baseline_groups.claim_summary: Small class size (vs. regular) improves kindergarten standardized test scores in the Project STAR experiment.
baseline_groups.notes: Baseline is OLS with school FE, no additional controls, full STAR sample. Coefficient ~5.27 points.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Teaching aide (vs. regular class) has no significant effect on kindergarten test scores in STAR.
baseline_groups.notes: Aide treatment is a secondary finding. Coefficient ~0.24, not significant (p=0.74).

global_notes: Methodology paper using STAR as illustration. Two Benhassine specs from different dataset not comparable. Some heterogeneity subsample specs duplicate sample restriction specs. Interaction specs change estimand.
